name: ext_R5_Organization_contact
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Organization.contact for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents Organization.contact from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Organization|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: Official contact details for the Organization
element.definition: The contact details of communication devices available relevant to the specific Organization. This can include addresses, phone numbers, fax numbers, mobile numbers, email addresses and web sites.
element.comment: `Organization.contact` maps to R4 `Organization.contact`. So is mapped as Equivalent.

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
Must have either extensions or value[x], not both

element.short: This contact detail is handled/monitored by a specific organization
element.definition: This contact detail is handled/monitored by a specific organization. If the name is provided in the contact, then it is referring to the named individual within this organization.
